resources.string: We will connect you to server
You are seeing these pages as this is the first time you have logged into this up. In future you will be logged in automatically.
All your information will be stored on a MySQL database
You will be able to send messages that will be stored on the Server and view them whenever you want
This application will also support input of Hebrew and English
All of the running of this app will be done while connected to our Web Server
